description:
DuckDuckGo announced its new Privacy Pro bundled service in an effort to provide more comprehensive privacy tools for users. The Privacy Pro bundle will include a VPN, personal data removal service, and 24/7 identify theft restoration. The service will initially be available only in the U.S. for $9.99 per month or $99.99 for a full-year subscription. It will integrate into and complement the company’s already excellent search engine and browser.

The new VPN, built entirely in-house by DuckDuckGo, promises not to log any user data and will run right in the DuckDuckGo browser — a standalone VPN app is not currently available. The VPN will allow for up t
title: DuckDuckGo launches Privacy Pro bundle with VPN included

description:
After a small eternity of waiting, OLED monitors are finally becoming commonplace. But that doesn’t mean they’re affordable. For most of the models on the market, you’re looking at four figures minimum, especially if you want an ultrawide model. So it’s a good thing that MSI has its 34-inch ultrawide OLED on sale today for a record low of $779.

The MSI MEG 342C is comparable to other 34-inch OLED monitors from Dell and Samsung, with a standard 3440×1440 resolution and a subtle 1800R curve to its panel. With a 175Hz refresh rate and a lightning-fast .03ms response time, it’s ready to tackle even the fastest multiplayer games wit
title: Get MSI’s ultrawide OLED monitor for $779, its lowest price yet

description:
PC gamers are no strangers to “bling” on their machines, both inside and out. But the newest motherboard and GPU combo will let you completely bling out your desktop PC with some ludicrously extravagant indulgences. In addition to the latest and most powerful components, they’re adorned with “crystalized titanium,” and accents made with actual gold.

The Gigabyte Z790 Aorus Xtreme X Ice is the base of this monument to excess. The motherboard is compatible with Intel 13th- and 14th-gen Core processors, naturally, but that’s just the meat and potatoes here. Above the primary I/O panel is
title: Gigabyte’s ‘Xtreme Ice’ RTX GPU and motherboard will deck out your PC

description:
The CPU OPT header is an additional connection for special processor cooling accessories, such as specialized coolers with multiple fans or water-cooling components. Functionally, CPU OPT is identical to CPU FAN.

The connector provides a 12-volt DC connection with at least one ampere to ensure that sufficient power is provided to the entire system to adequately cool the chip.

Despite the almost identical function, there are some differences between CPU OPT and CPU FAN. CPU OPT does not check whether a connection exists before the system is booted. In contrast, the system reports an error and refuses to boot completely if there is no connection to CPU FAN.

CPU OPT only supplies power to the connected device, while CPU FAN both supplies power and communicates with the motherboard’s BIOS or UEFI system to provide statistical da
title: CPU-FAN versus CPU-OPT on motherboards: What’s the difference?

description:
Picture this, you’ve settled down to enjoy your favorite adult content, you’re alone, you’ve set the mood, everything is ready. But before you can click play, you’re asked to provide multiple pictures of yourself and official ID in good lighting with the documents clearly visible. Then upload all of this and pass it through an age-verification system. And then still be in the mood to get back to your original business. 

This is the recent reality for many in the U.S. after certain states have passed age-verification laws for adult websites. In March of this year, the popular adult site PornHub went dark in Texas in order to protest new strict laws imposed by the state requiring just such verifications, following similar standoffs in other states.

Fortunately, getting around site-specific geographical restr
title: How to access adult content websites with a VPN

description:
Cloud or online storage is practical for many reasons: Provided you have an internet connection, you can access your data from anywhere, regardless of the end device.

Synchronization ensures that content is always up to date wherever you are. Photos, screenshots, and other files can be backed up automatically, files can be shared, browser settings and passwords can be synchronized, as well as — at least with Microsoft OneDrive — system and app settings.

get windows 11 pro for cheap
title: 9 must-know Microsoft OneDrive tips: Get more from Windows cloud storage

description:
